item.title: Connection Errors. Nobody can connect!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

Well i been working on this server for 2 days now and decided to try and get it online.

I have portforwarded with utorrent and changed the ip in gui.java.

Now I have a big problem, before I changed both of these to my no-ip IP…

[code]

private Gui(String args[]) 
{
	super();
	try 
	{

System.out.println(“Connecting”);
//launchURL(“DestinyPK”);
Serverip = “destinypkerz.no-ip.biz”;
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

		initUI();




	} [/code] and

[code]

public static String detail = null;
int world = 1;
public static String loop = null;
public static String settalk = null;
public static String setchateffects = null;
public static String setname = null;
public static String setchat = null;
public JFrame frame;
public String Serverip = “destinypkerz.no-ip.biz”;
public static double version = 6.0;

public static String frameTitle = “Destiny Pk Client - V1”;
}[/code]
I was able to connect on my own before I changed these.

Now I cannot connect and neither can my players.

Help please.

I’m sure this is something to do with portforwarding.

I have teamviewer and I am willing to give staff position away to whoever helps me get this online

PM me if you can help

  • Mikey

Read full topic
